messages.message:
I really miss Iga!!! she was my best friend! what should I do to get her back??? any advice??
please?
I wrote he a letter on skype and I sent her a friend request two times and she never excepted me...after she deleted me :-((
and I send her message on facebook..I don't know how often she checks her facebook ...

Happy New Year guys!!!! I wish you to have the best year you have ever had!!!!! 

love u!!!

Brian
928-221-8555 careful who you give that to.
